patch_unified:
diff --git a/bin/elasticsearch b/bin/elasticsearch
index 753aa8e..8aa807c 100755
--- a/bin/elasticsearch
+++ b/bin/elasticsearch
@@ -151,6 +151,7 @@ launch_service()
 }
 
 # Parse any command line options.
+properties=""
 args=`getopt vdhp:D:X: "$@"`
 eval set -- "$args"
 
@@ -170,7 +171,7 @@ while true; do
             shift
         ;;
         -h)
-            echo "Usage: $0 [-d] [-h] [-p pidfile]"
+            echo "Usage: $0 [-d] [-h] [-p pidfile] [--key=value ...]"
             exit 0
         ;;
         -D)
@@ -192,6 +193,41 @@ while true; do
     esac
 done
 
+# Support passing any elasticsearch setting as --key=value which maps to
+# -Des.key=value
+while [ $# -gt 0 ]; do
+    case $1 in
+        --*)
+            option=${1#--}
+            if [ -z "$option" ]; then
+                echo "Error parsing argument $1!" >&2
+                exit 1
+            fi
+            case $option in
+                *=*)
+                    name=${option%%=*}
+                    value=${option#*=}
+                ;;
+                *)
+                    if [ $# -lt 2 ]; then
+                        echo "Option --$option requires an argument" >&2
+                        exit 1
+                    fi
+                    name=$option
+                    value=$2
+                    shift
+                ;;
+            esac
+            properties="$properties -Des.$name=$value"
+            shift
+        ;;
+        *)
+            echo "Error parsing argument $1!" >&2
+            exit 1
+        ;;
+    esac
+done
+
 # Start up the service
 launch_service "$pidfile" "$daemonized" "$properties"
